casebody.data:
Rene PEREZ, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 6495. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 30, 1932. Theodore H. MoG-iehan, of New Orleans, La., for appellant. E. E. Talbot, U. S. Atty., and William H. Norman, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of New Orleans, La.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and SIB-LEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
